name: Pesto Puff Pastry Pinwheels
author: kyky
summary: A simple and quick puff pastry and pesto pinwheel recipe with pine nuts and Parmesan cheese. These are perfect for just piling on a platter and sharing with friends!
ingredients: ½ (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Dust a flat work surface lightly with flour
Unroll puff pastry sheet and roll out into a rectangle
Spread pesto evenly over puff pastry, smoothing it out with a spoon
Scatter pine nuts evenly over the pesto and top with grated Parmesan cheese
Roll puff pastry up tightly like a jelly roll from the longer side
Slice puff pastry roll into 12 to 15 pinwheels about 1/2-inch-thick
Lay pinwheels on the prepared baking sheet, leaving some space between each one
Bake in the preheated oven until pastry is lightly browned, 15 to 20 minutes
Let sit for 1 minute on baking sheet before removing
